name: Meeting at the bridge
description:
Meeting at the bridge is a bitsy made for The Bitsy Community Secret Santa 2019!

I was the secret santa for NoahBoah!

The music is That's it for today by ViRiX.
The giant robot is the sRGB unit by zonked parsed through image to bitsy and modified a bit by me!

Reviews from our playtesters!

"neat" - candle

"the missing evangelion episode" - lunafromthemoon
